metadata.name: Silent Strength
metadata.description: "Silent Strength" is a powerful art piece featuring Maryam , a Muslim woman wearing a hijab, exuding quiet confidence .The painting's bold colors create a striking contrast and complement Maryam's posture and expression. Maryam drew strength from herself and learned to walk with confidence, inspiring others who faced discrimination and prejudice. "Silent Strength" celebrates the nuances of Muslim femininity and challenges traditional notions of identity, showcasing the power of art to inspire meaningful conversations about strength and beauty.
